page.title: 03Greencourt Farm,Bettws
page.content: The day we went to the farm we walked up the lane until we came to the farm gate.Mr.Evans the farmer met us.First of all he showed us young{ {chicks.}We all held one.We also saw{ {goslings}and noticed their webbed feet. There was a{cow}in a field as well as a{horse}and a{donkey.}We also saw two {goats.}There were{sheep}and lambs in the fields too.Farmers need{dogs}to help look after sheep.Mr.Evans had three dogs called Brandy , Lady and Nuffy.Mr.Evans breeds{budgerigars}and he showed us the birds in their cages. After we had been shown around the farm we asked the farmer questions.Before we left,the farmer's son gave each of us an apple.We said thankyou and walked back to school. Delia Curtis 1W Scott Carlin 1W
